subject: Inquiry: Patient Referral for BIIB122/DNL151
body:
Dear Maria,

I hope this email finds you well.

We have identified a patient within our ROPAD Parkinson's genetics study at the University Hospital of Tübingen who appears to meet the preliminary genetic criteria for the BIIB122/DNL151 study. 

Could you please provide us with the protocol for patient referral? Additionally, we would appreciate the contact information for the nearest participating clinical trial site in Europe for this study.

Thank you for your assistance.

Best regards,

Dr. Klaus Schmidt
Study Coordinator
Department of Neurology
University Hospital of Tübingen

subject: Fwd: Inquiry: Patient Referral for BIIB122/DNL151
body:
Hi Alex,

Please see the inquiry below from a ROPAD study site in Germany. They have a potential referral candidate for the BIIB122/DNL151 study.

Could you please advise on the standard procedure for this type of referral and provide the contact details for the appropriate site? 

Thanks,

Maria Garcia
Clinical Research Associate
Syneos Health

From: Dr. Klaus Schmidt <k.schmidt@uktuebingen.de>

Subject: Inquiry: Patient Referral for BIIB122/DNL151
To: Maria Garcia <m.garcia@syneos.com>

Dear Maria,

I hope this email finds you well.

We have identified a patient within our ROPAD Parkinson's genetics study at the University Hospital of Tübingen who appears to meet the preliminary genetic criteria for the BIIB122/DNL151 study. 

Could you please provide us with the protocol for patient referral? Additionally, we would appreciate the contact information for the nearest participating clinical trial site in Europe for this study.

Thank you for your assistance.

Best regards,

Dr. Klaus Schmidt
Study Coordinator
Department of Neurology
University Hospital of Tübingen
